actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that Federal assistance under the Federal Housing Administration will not be denied for housing solely on the basis that such housing is located in an area identified by a Federal agency as an area subject to the highest noise-level resulting from the air transportation conducted in connection with the operation of a nearby civilian or military airport, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to prohibit the denial of assistance under the Federal Housing Administration mortgage insurance programs solely because the housing is located in an area identified by any federal agency as an area subject to a high noise level resulting from air transportation conducted in connection with the operation of a nearby civilian or military airport.

titles.title: A bill to provide that Federal assistance under the Federal Housing Administration will not be denied for housing solely on the basis that such housing is located in an area identified by a Federal agency as an area subject to the highest noise-level resulting from the air transportation conducted in connection with the operation of a nearby civilian or military airport, and for other purposes.
